body:
PAPI never completes building; spack appears to hang on `filter_file`, running at 100% CPU.

### Expected Result
PAPI builds and installs.

### Actual Result
Spack hangs after filtering files, consuming 100% CPU on a single core.
It never appears to actually get to `make()`, from looking at the build log.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack install papi
```

### Information on your system
* Arch Linux
* x86_64
* glibc 2.26
* GCC 7.3.0
* Python 3.6.4
title: filter_file can't handle non-UTF8 files
